Snap this right here, this right here is tight!!!!!!\u003C/p\u003E","timestamp":37417,"track_id":100125486},{"id":123365278,"uri":"/jacksonissirius/black-for-jack-original-mix/comments/123365278/","avatar":"http://a1.sndcdn.com/images/default_avatar_tiny.png?aa1a7cb","name":"Jazzpalafox336","userPermalink":"jazzpalafox336-1","userUri":"/jazzpalafox336-1","userId":40917805,"trackOwnerId":1947729,"created_at":"2013/07/12 23:18:55 +0000","body":"\u003Cp\u003Ethe drums at the beginning sound really nice n the drop just kills it :) good track but very hardcore DUbStep\u003C/p\u003E","timestamp":49753,"track_id":100125486},{"id":123365038,"uri":"/jacksonissirius/black-for-jack-original-mix/comments/123365038/","avatar":"http://i1.sndcdn.com/avatars-000046878428-wzjn6a-tiny.jpg?aa1a7cb","name":"emocean","userPermalink":"emocean","userUri":"/emocean","userId":13231,"trackOwnerId":1947729,"created_at":"2013/07/12 23:16:53 +0000","body":"\u003Cp\u003Estrange beat but deffo vibing to it, would be live if it was in a club \u003C/p\u003E","timestamp":64966,"track_id":100125486},{"id":123365884,"uri":"/jacksonissirius/black-for-jack-original-mix/comments/123365884/","avatar":"http://i1.sndcdn.com/avatars-000048806526-gt9ca5-tiny.jpg?aa1a7cb","name":"SYNTREX","userPermalink":"syntrexofficial","userUri":"/syntrexofficial","userId":27269489,"trackOwnerId":1947729,"created_at":"2013/07/12 23:23:05 +0000","body":"\u003Cp\u003Elove the bass patch only thing i could have suggested would have been a lil better mix down the kick sounds kinda hidden at times otherwise killer track\u003C/p\u003E","timestamp":75246,"track_id":100125486},{"id":123365516,"uri":"/jacksonissirius/black-for-jack-original-mix/comments/123365516/","avatar":"http://i1.sndcdn.com/avatars-000023003710-bt65nk-tiny.jpg?aa1a7cb","name":"Phene","userPermalink":"phene","userUri":"/phene","userId":483631,"trackOwnerId":1947729,"created_at":"2013/07/12 23:20:36 +0000","body":"\u003Cp\u003EReminds me of the feel of some Transformers Theme Music... not a bad thing! \u003C/p\u003E","timestamp":105673,"track_id":100125486},{"id":125195922,"uri":"/jacksonissirius/black-for-jack-original-mix/comments/125195922/","avatar":"http://i1.sndcdn.com/avatars-000010705445-cdwems-tiny.jpg?aa1a7cb","name":"craigwilliamsmusic","userPermalink":"craigwilliamsmusic","userUri":"/craigwilliamsmusic","userId":24501,"trackOwnerId":1947729,"created_at":"2013/07/23 22:29:35 +0000","body":"\u003Cp\u003Ethe mix def needs some work, you have a over full sounding mix, let things breath a little. There is no really low end in the mix. With bass music you really want to feel that low ed.\u003C/p\u003E","timestamp":114897,"track_id":100125486},{"id":122516287,"uri":"/jacksonissirius/black-for-jack-original-mix/comments/122516287/","avatar":"http://i1.sndcdn.com/avatars-000045079012-5f34s3-tiny.jpg?aa1a7cb","name":"HyprrDrive","userPermalink":"hyprrdrive","userUri":"/hyprrdrive","userId":2370054,"trackOwnerId":1947729,"created_at":"2013/07/08 06:20:12 +0000","body":"\u003Cp\u003Egetting better with the writing melodies :)\u003C/p\u003E","timestamp":216785,"track_id":100125486},{"id":125196579,"uri":"/jacksonissirius/black-for-jack-original-mix/comments/125196579/","avatar":"http://i1.sndcdn.com/avatars-000010705445-cdwems-tiny.jpg?aa1a7cb","name":"craigwilliamsmusic","userPermalink":"craigwilliamsmusic","userUri":"/craigwilliamsmusic","userId":24501,"trackOwnerId":1947729,"created_at":"2013/07/23 22:34:04 +0000","body":"\u003Cp\u003Ereally take some time with the mix, try pulling all the elements down to silence and then have another go. I feel 90% of your tracks you post in the group lack a solid mix. Try testing the track out on every set of speakers you can find. Also once you think the track is 100% done leave it for a week without listening to it and then come back and see how it sounds.\u003C/p\u003E","timestamp":271019,"track_id":100125486},{"id":125274299,"uri":"/jacksonissirius/black-for-jack-original-mix/comments/125274299/","avatar":"http://i1.sndcdn.com/avatars-000048539238-tkdo12-tiny.jpg?aa1a7cb","name":"Cambah;","userPermalink":"cambah","userUri":"/cambah","userId":1081153,"trackOwnerId":1947729,"created_at":"2013/07/24 11:27:35 +0000","body":"\u003Cp\u003Estill love your grime dubstep stuff man \u0026lt;3\u003C/p\u003E","timestamp":286873,"track_id":100125486},{"id":125274360,"uri":"/jacksonissirius/black-for-jack-original-mix/comments/125274360/","avatar":"http://i1.sndcdn.com/avatars-000048539238-tkdo12-tiny.jpg?aa1a7cb","name":"Cambah;","userPermalink":"cambah","userUri":"/cambah","userId":1081153,"trackOwnerId":1947729,"created_at":"2013/07/24 11:28:06 +0000","body":"\u003Cp\u003Eneeds some variation though, a breakdown and a drop would be nice\u003C/p\u003E","timestamp":297561,"track_id":100125486},{"id":125196591,"uri":"/jacksonissirius/black-for-jack-original-mix/comments/125196591/","avatar":"http://i1.sndcdn.com/avatars-000010705445-cdwems-tiny.jpg?aa1a7cb","name":"craigwilliamsmusic","userPermalink":"craigwilliamsmusic","userUri":"/craigwilliamsmusic","userId":24501,"trackOwnerId":1947729,"created_at":"2013/07/23 22:34:08 +0000","body":"\u003Cp\u003Eplease listen and give feedback on at least two other tracks in the group before posting another track to the group.\u003C/p\u003E","timestamp":312244,"track_id":100125486},{"id":123366578,"uri":"/jacksonissirius/black-for-jack-original-mix/comments/123366578/","avatar":"http://i1.sndcdn.com/avatars-000022306848-g12a1p-tiny.jpg?aa1a7cb","name":"Kode-of-Bliss","userPermalink":"kellybarnard","userUri":"/kellybarnard","userId":4157153,"trackOwnerId":1947729,"created_at":"2013/07/12 23:28:32 +0000","body":"\u003Cp\u003ELove all the panning action here at the end. This was actually pretty relaxing dubsteb. Nice progression. Wobs are well done. beats move the track. Nice dub.\u003C/p\u003E","timestamp":331413,"track_id":100125486},{"id":123374047,"uri":"/jacksonissirius/black-for-jack-original-mix/comments/123374047/","avatar":"http://i1.sndcdn.com/avatars-000040683826-1mwolf-tiny.jpg?aa1a7cb","name":"Sirius Jack!","userPermalink":"jacksonissirius","userUri":"/jacksonissirius","userId":1947729,"trackOwnerId":1947729,"created_at":"2013/07/13 00:33:03 +0000","body":"\u003Cp\u003E@\u003Ca href=\"http://soundcloud.com/kellybarnard\" rel=\"nofollow\" target=\"_blank\"\u003EKode-of-Bliss\u003C/a\u003E: thanks dude! I appreciate it a bunch\u003C/p\u003E","timestamp":331413,"track_id":100125486}]); window.SC.bufferTracks[window.SC.bufferTracks.length - 1].conversations = {"34325":[122516032],"37417":[123369522],"49753":[123365278],"64966":[123365038],"75246":[123365884],"105673":[123365516],"114897":[125195922],"216785":[122516287],"271019":[125196579],"286873":[125274299],"297561":[125274360],"312244":[125196591],"331413":[123366578,123374047]};

kick.\u003C/p\u003E","timestamp":92527,"track_id":92723803},{"id":116445240,"uri":"/jacksonissirius/sirius-jack-vanish-original/comments/116445240/","avatar":"http://i1.sndcdn.com/avatars-000010705445-cdwems-tiny.jpg?aa1a7cb","name":"craigwilliamsmusic","userPermalink":"craigwilliamsmusic","userUri":"/craigwilliamsmusic","userId":24501,"trackOwnerId":1947729,"created_at":"2013/06/03 00:16:02 +0000","body":"\u003Cp\u003Eand the snare needs some work to make it punchier \u003C/p\u003E","timestamp":101087,"track_id":92723803},{"id":116505528,"uri":"/jacksonissirius/sirius-jack-vanish-original/comments/116505528/","avatar":"http://i1.sndcdn.com/avatars-000047682290-wndjv8-tiny.jpg?aa1a7cb","name":"Nymus","userPermalink":"iamnymus","userUri":"/iamnymus","userId":1082092,"trackOwnerId":1947729,"created_at":"2013/06/03 11:03:43 +0000","body":"\u003Cp\u003Ecool sounds but need more love on the EQ part\u003C/p\u003E","timestamp":105392,"track_id":92723803},{"id":117327539,"uri":"/jacksonissirius/sirius-jack-vanish-original/comments/117327539/","avatar":"http://i1.sndcdn.com/avatars-000006625961-r4u1dl-tiny.jpg?aa1a7cb","name":"MOrlov","userPermalink":"djmorlov","userUri":"/djmorlov","userId":2414061,"trackOwnerId":1947729,"created_at":"2013/06/07 18:49:25 +0000","body":"\u003Cp\u003Eit sounds to me like drums are completely buried under synths when it should be smacking in the face\u003C/p\u003E","timestamp":124777,"track_id":92723803},{"id":117881662,"uri":"/jacksonissirius/sirius-jack-vanish-original/comments/117881662/","avatar":"http://i1.sndcdn.com/avatars-000030872209-dl6qhn-tiny.jpg?aa1a7cb","name":"ZAKII","userPermalink":"zakiimusic","userUri":"/zakiimusic","userId":2425901,"trackOwnerId":1947729,"created_at":"2013/06/11 02:02:57 +0000","body":"\u003Cp\u003Enice stereo width on the basses\u003C/p\u003E","timestamp":140228,"track_id":92723803},{"id":117881862,"uri":"/jacksonissirius/sirius-jack-vanish-original/comments/117881862/","avatar":"http://i1.sndcdn.com/avatars-000030872209-dl6qhn-tiny.jpg?aa1a7cb","name":"ZAKII","userPermalink":"zakiimusic","userUri":"/zakiimusic","userId":2425901,"trackOwnerId":1947729,"created_at":"2013/06/11 02:05:01 +0000","body":"\u003Cp\u003Ebut this bass is too centered, stick with your stereo technique for the other basses I commented on\u003C/p\u003E","timestamp":225791,"track_id":92723803},{"id":116445487,"uri":"/jacksonissirius/sirius-jack-vanish-original/comments/116445487/","avatar":"http://i1.sndcdn.com/avatars-000010705445-cdwems-tiny.jpg?aa1a7cb","name":"craigwilliamsmusic","userPermalink":"craigwilliamsmusic","userUri":"/craigwilliamsmusic","userId":24501,"trackOwnerId":1947729,"created_at":"2013/06/03 00:18:23 +0000","body":"\u003Cp\u003EI like some of the sounds in your track. I just think that it lacks a real hook. You have a cool breakdown I would build on that idea and try and run it as a theme through the track. Also the mix needs a little more work. DnB needs to have those drums locked. Keep up the good work though.\u003C/p\u003E","timestamp":274320,"track_id":92723803},{"id":116445535,"uri":"/jacksonissirius/sirius-jack-vanish-original/comments/116445535/","avatar":"http://i1.sndcdn.com/avatars-000010705445-cdwems-tiny.jpg?aa1a7cb","name":"craigwilliamsmusic","userPermalink":"craigwilliamsmusic","userUri":"/craigwilliamsmusic","userId":24501,"trackOwnerId":1947729,"created_at":"2013/06/03 00:18:53 +0000","body":"\u003Cp\u003Edon't forget to listen and leave feedback to the other tracks in the group (not my tracks)\u003C/p\u003E","timestamp":302445,"track_id":92723803}]); window.SC.bufferTracks[window.SC.bufferTracks.length - 1].conversations = {"44022":[116445057],"47298":[114292129],"52059":[122935534],"67255":[116445108],"85563":[117881557],"92527":[116445179],"101087":[116445240],"105392":[116505528],"124777":[117327539],"140228":[117881662],"225791":[117881862],"274320":[116445487],"302445":[116445535]};
